Module com.example.c195
Package com.example.c195

Class AppointmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.c195.AppointmentController
  • public class AppointmentController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller for the appointment records view

    Implemented populateCombos method through lambda functions because the callback function is quite messy otherwise
